mapper.insert: insert into product(product_code, product_name, product_img, origin, brand, product_weight, roast_dgree, crushing, is_single_origin, is_decafe, manufacturing, origin_price, sale_price, quantity, grade_point, expiration_date ) values(#{product_code},#{product_name},#{product_img}, #{origin}, #{brand}, #{product_weight}, #{roast_dgree}, #{crushing}, #{is_single_origin}, #{is_decafe}, #{manufacturing}, #{origin_price}, #{sale_price}, #{quantity}, #{grade_point}, #{expiration_date})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE is_single_origin = #{is_single_origin} order by idx
